price: Hapana ila uhai wetu wa duniani tu, tunakufa na kuishi basi. Wala sisi hatutafufuliwa.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
footnotes: Hapana uhai ila mmoja tu. Nao ndio huu uhai wa duniani, ambao tunauona una mauti na uhai unao tupitia. Kinacho zaliwa kinazaliwa, na kilicho hai kinakufa. Wala hatutofufuliwa baada ya kwisha kufa kabisa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
